FuncDef:
The clock ethernet-synchronization enable command enables the synchronous Ethernet clock function.
The undo clock ethernet-synchronization enable command disables the synchronous Ethernet clock function.
By default, the synchronous Ethernet clock function is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The device support configuration and through the CFG file configuration, can be configured, configuration does not take effect.
This command is for VRP V5 to VRP V8 compatibility and is not actually used on VRP V8.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
